name: Pureya 2
description:
Simple arcade games are great, but they can get boring quickly. What if they changed every 10seconds? now it is every 20 seconds

Pureya 2  is a collection second version of game  of arcade minigames that play with just 2 buttons.

Every 20 seconds, the game will jump from one random minigame to another.

Avoid obstacles and collect as many marbles as you can, then use them in the pachinko machine to unlock new mini games, music and skins.

Enjoy a varied collection of 100+ minigames 20 seconds at a time or challenge them individually to aim for a high score.
